---
id: get-template
title: "Get template"
description: "Fetches full details for one template associated with a particular object type in a space. The response provides the template’s identifier, name, icon, and any other relevant metadata. This endpoint is useful when a client needs to preview or apply a template to prefill object creation fields."
sidebar_label: "Get template"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/reference/2025-04-22/anytype-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get template"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/spaces/{space_id}/types/{type_id}/templates/{template_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetches full details for one template associated with a particular object type in a space. The response provides the template’s identifier, name, icon, and any other relevant metadata. This endpoint is useful when a client needs to preview or apply a template to prefill object creation fields.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

</Heading>

</ParamsDetails>

</RequestSchema>
